availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Major F. Fields (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth Fields. Father of Sally Fields, Samuel Fields, W. B. Fields, Robert Fields, John Fields, Nancy J. Fields, James Fields, Mary E. Fields, Matilda Fields, and Francis Fields. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 257. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts, p. 51. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 21.
